item.name: Enhanced Risk Assessment API

request.description: ðŸ†• Enhanced risk assessment with full factor breakdown - perfect for detailed modal view
Enhanced risk for Seattle USPS package - expect high risk due to weather + carrier combo
Enhanced risk for Portland FedEx package - expect lower risk score

item.description: ðŸŽ¯ Enhanced Risk Assessment API - Returns detailed factor breakdown with confidence levels

item.name: Get All Packages with Risk Scores

request.description: Get all packages with smart database-driven risk assessments
Get detailed risk assessment for PKG001 (Seattle UPS delivery)
Get risk assessment for PKG004 (Miami DHL delivery - high risk area)
Send email alert for high-risk package PKG001
Log customer choosing to accept delay
Log customer requesting refund due to delay
Check service health and dependencies

item.name: Admin & Analytics

request.description: Get comprehensive performance analytics from database
Check database health and table statistics
Get detailed risk analysis for Seattle zip code 98101
Get detailed risk analysis for Miami zip code 33101 (high risk area)
Get comprehensive UPS performance analysis across all zip codes
Get comprehensive USPS performance analysis (typically highest risk carrier)

item.description: Admin endpoints for analytics and database management

item.name: Learning System

request.description: Record successful on-time delivery to improve UPS-Seattle performance metrics
Record weather-delayed delivery to Miami (2 days late) to worsen USPS-Miami metrics
Record major 4-day delay to Chicago due to DHL operational issues

item.description: Endpoints for recording delivery outcomes to improve risk predictions

request.description: Get last 10 customer actions for debugging
Get basic service information and available endpoints

item.name: Test Sequence - Complete Workflow

request.description: Step 1: Verify service is running and healthy
Step 2: Verify database is initialized with seed data
Step 3: See all packages with database-driven risk scores
Step 4: Get detailed analysis of highest risk package (Miami DHL)
Step 5: Send alert email for the high-risk Miami package
Step 6: Log customer choosing refund due to high risk
Step 7: Record that package was indeed delayed (5 days late) - validates prediction
Step 8: See how the recorded outcome updated database metrics

item.description: Complete workflow test - run these in sequence to see the full system in action
